pageContext.claim: “[We] have also secured historic levels of funding to give schools and police more resources to protect their students. ”
pageContext.analysis: The omnibus spending bill shifted $75 billion from an existing school safety program to found the STOP School Violence programs. In other words, these were not new "historic" funds. Plus, as our friends at Factcheck.org reported, funding for school safety programs topped $260 billion as recently as 2000.
